title1: Free "Learn Programming in Java" online course
title2: Paid Three Day Live Course via Zoom - On Your Schedule
intro1: Watch and learn how to program in Java(tm) using our free online tutorials. Each lesson covers one topic. Included with the course is a complete set of lab exercises.
intro2: Would you like a live experienced instructor to provide a custom version of the course in English? Choose this option and we will quote a price for you.
